attributes.action: Change the age of when miscarried babies can be legally buried/cremated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the age of when miscarried babies can be buried is around 21 weeks (aproximatley 5 months pregnant) as that is when they are legally classed as a child in the womb babies should be classed as a child from when the parent is 1 month pregnant onwards. If a mother should miscarry at 4 weeks pregnant or over the baby should be classed as a child and legally buried/cremated.
